entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a poltergeist who stuck out his tongue and threw water bombs into the air.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher who told Peeves to move along.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who slipped and slid across the entrance hall with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student who was muttering furiously under his breath as he pushed his sopping hair off his face.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who walked past the Slytherins with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is one of the four houses in the Great Hall.

entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: Ravenclaw is one of the four houses in the Great Hall.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall told Peeves to move along.
Harry, Ron, and Hermione walked past the Slytherins together.
Hermione walked past the Slytherins with Harry and Ron.
Harry, Ron, and Hermione walked past the Slytherins together.
Hermione walked past the Ravenclaws with Harry and Ron.
